text: The OFC Nations Cup is an international football (soccer) tournament held among member nations of the Oceania Football Confederation (OFC). It was first held in 1973, under the name Oceania Nations Cup. It was held every two years from 1996 to 2004; since then it has been held every four years. ==Results== * 1973: New Zealand * 1980: Australia * 1996: Australia * 1998: New Zealand * 2000: Australia * 2002: New Zealand * 2004: Australia * 2008: New Zealand * 2012: Tahiti * 2016: New Zealand Category:Football competitions Category:Football in Oceania Category:1973 establishments in Oceania
title: OFC Nations Cup
